(:action add_macaroni
    :parameters (?p - player ?l - location ?m - macaroni ?w - water)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?l) (boiled ?w) (not (cooked ?m)))
    :effect (cooked ?m)
)

(:action add_oil
    :parameters (?p - player ?l - location ?pan - pan ?oil - oil)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?l) (has_pan ?pan ?l))
    :effect (oiled ?pan)
)

(:action add_macaroni_to_pan
    :parameters (?p - player ?l - location ?m - macaroni ?pan - pan)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?l) (drained ?m) (oiled ?pan))
    :effect (in_pan ?m ?pan)
)

(:action add_sauce_and_spices
    :parameters (?p - player ?l - location ?pan - pan ?s - sauce ?sp - spices)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?l) (in_pan ?m ?pan))
    :effect (seasoned ?pan)
)
